mapper.select: SELECT PRJ_CD as "prjCd" /*프로젝트코드*/ , WBS_CD as "wbsCd" /*WBS_CODE*/ , SEQ as "seq" /*순서*/ , MBO_GOAL_YEAR as "mboGoalYear" /*목표년도YYYY*/ , MBO_GOAL_ALTP as "mboGoalAltp" /*목표배점*/ , MBO_GOAL_PRVS as "mboGoalPrvs" /*목표항목*/ , MBO_GOAL_L as "mboGoalL" /*목표수준*/ , ARLS_YEAR_MON as "arlsYearMon" /*실적년월YYYY-MM*/ , ARLS_STTS as "arlsStts" /*진척현황*/ , FIL_ID as "filId" /*첨부파일ID*/ , GOAL_SEQ as goalSeq /*목표번호*/ FROM IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MBO WHERE PRJ_CD = #{prjCd} AND SEQ = #{seq}
